sentences.en: By the late eighties their number had grown fourfold.
sentences.cn: 到80年代末的时候，他们的数量已是原来的4倍。

sentences.en: Doubling hf-current results in a doubling of current density and a fourfold heat provided that the area of effective contact between the tissue ang the electrode remains constant.
sentences.cn: 如果人体组织和电极之间的有效接触面积保持不变，那么高频电流强度扩大一倍将会使电流密度增大一倍，并产生四倍的热量。

sentences.en: Electric hand is basic be electric head ache is fourfold.
sentences.cn: 电手基本是电头疼痛的四倍.

sentences.en: For a diagnosis of tularemia you need a fourfold increase in serum antibody levels.
sentences.cn: 要诊断是兔热症,她的血清抗体等级需要有4个部分的增长.

sentences.en: Further down the supply chain, garlic prices have jumped tenfold on wholesale markets in big cities and fourfold nationwide.
sentences.cn: 沿供应链向下，其大城市批发价格跳升十倍，而全国售价则上升四倍。

sentences.en: He acted illegitimately when he increased the rent fourfold.
sentences.cn: 他非法地把租金增加到原来的四倍.

sentences.en: In some cases output has increased more than fourfold.
sentences.cn: 在有些情况下,产量增加了3倍多.
利润上升到原来的四倍。

sentences.en: That has risen fourfold, to around 800.
sentences.cn: 这种情况现在已经增加到4倍, 大约有800个职位属于这种情况.

sentences.en: The "other" division, in which they are lumped with cloud services, grew nearly fourfold, but is still less than one-tenth of the top line.
sentences.cn: 与云服务一同被归类到“其他”业务的部门增长近四倍，但营收仍不到总营收的十分之一。

sentences.en: The mineral's price increased fourfold in 2008, peaking at more than $ 800 a tonne.
sentences.cn: 2008年,钾肥价格上涨了3倍, 达到每吨逾800美元的历史最高水平.

sentences.en: The supply of fist grew fourfold there.
sentences.cn: 那里鱼的供应量增加了三倍.

sentences.en: Web - based teaching has become a growing global trend . This paper is fourfold.
sentences.cn: 网络教学无论在国际还是国内都已经成为一种发展趋势.

trans.tran_en: four times as much or as many
by or up to four times as many or as much
